name: Little Sweet Nightmares​
description:
Little Sweet Nightmares

Little Sweet Nightmares is an action game where four tiny monsters fight each other for candy on Halloween night.

We highly recommend playing with an Xbox controller, but in case one isn't available you can still play with a keyboard. 

Any feedback after playing would be highly appreciated. By answering a few questions you can help us improve the game!
